author: Tasha Wibawa
title: 'Zero options': Many Australians in Peru missing out on coronavirus evacuation flight
description: Hundreds of Australians in Peru hoping to get home amid the coronavirus pandemic will miss out on a government-charted evacuation flight to Sydney for which tickets cost more than $5,000 and are now sold out.
content:
Posted 
March 28, 2020 16:05:29
In early March, Australian Merinda Kyle travelled more than 18 hours to Peru to attend her son's wedding. Now she is one of hundreds of Australians stuck in the country and hoping to find a way back home.
